meaningMnemonic: When a <radical>spirit</radical> decides to live in your <radical>scarecrow</radical>, you'll be granted good <kanji>luck</kanji> and good <kanji>fortune</kanji>. Crows won't hang out in your farm. Everything you grow will become large and delicious. But not everyone is so lucky that a spirit will decide to live in their scarecrow. So maybe the luck was in you all along!
readingMnemonic: You want to check the scarecrow to make sure your recent <kanji>luck</kanji> is coming from it, so you kick it. "<reading>F***</reading> (ふく) you!" it yells. Oh yeah, there's a spirit in there.
